creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Small rectangular structure with decorative, pyramid-shaped roof; roof glazed a dark matte color, with decorative element at each corner; lower section divided into two areas on three sides with brown glazed arched doorways below and brown-glazed lattice with flower motif above; fourth side open, hollow; four small holes on two sides next to open side
markings: Sotheby\'s sticker on bottom; \'01(57)/M175878\', on bottom
portfolio: From From a large tileworks retinue
title: Palanquin
